p: CT and ultrasound of the abdomen revealed abnormalities in 44/51 dogs. Hepatomegaly and peritoneal effusion were present in 20 dogs respectively, gallbladder wall thickening in 17, gallbladder sludge in 15, splenic nodule in 13, diffuse steatitis in 11, enlarged pancreas and abdominal lymphadenopathy in 8 and splenomegaly in 7 dogs.
